title: Sushi Rolls
directions: Add the sushi to a pan and rinse and drain a couple of times.
Add the water and bring to the boil. Once boiling cover with a lid, reduce the heat and allow the rice to cook on a low heat whilst keeping an eye on it.
Once the rice is cooked through, remove the lid and allow to cool.
When the rice has cooled stir in the vinegar.
ingredients: Cling film and toasted black and white sesame seeds for Uramaki
